name: Gold Clicker Game
description:
Bored??? Tired of casual bad design browser clicker games??   Well then I got you! Gold Clicker game is exactly the opposite - you can download it and play it even without the internet and it even has better design than casual browser clicker games!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Caution: the game is still in development and you may encounter some small not game-breaking bugs, please report them to me.

Public Game Versions:

V1.0   22-09-22
Changes:  None
Known bugs:  1. - You can click multiple buttons at the same time | 2. - Sometimes can't buy an upgrade even tho I have enough money/dmd (fix: get 1 more coin/dmd, then buy it)
